Steps.Message: Update at 09:25 - We're pleased to report that all power in the Lochmere Close area should now be restored. Our engineers have now safely connected temporary generators, and these will be providing your power while our engineers work to fully repair the fault on the underground cabling. Depending on what the issue is, it may take a few days for our engineers to plan in the work and make their repairs, but once this is completed safely the generators can be removed, and network power will be resumed. If you'd like any further information, or if your power is not restored, please call us any time on 08003163105.

We became aware of a power cut at 10:27. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Our engineers have now safely connected temporary generators, and these will be providing your power while our engineers work to fully repair the fault on the underground cabling. Depending on what the issue is, it may take a few days for our engineers to plan in the work and make their repairs, but once this is completed safely the generators can be removed, and network power will be resumed. If you'd like any further information, or if your power is not restored, please call us any time on 08003163105.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
